page.title: 09Two Children's Games
page.content: Bulldog is running between two walls without being caught.Each time you touch one of the walls you can shout "Barley!".This means that you are in a safe place where you cannot be caught. You must run regularly between the two walls. Murder in the Dark is for at least 5 players.Pieces of paper are given out. One piece has a blue dot and another piece has a red dot;the rest are blank.The person who has the blue dot shows the others.He/she is the police- man and must leave the room.The light is switched off.The person with the red dot then "murders" someone by touching them.This person fall to the floor.The policeman is the let in and he has to guess by looking at the faces of the players who has committed the "murder".If he guesses right he has won the game.
